name: Fortnight Before Christmas
description:
Welcome to our 2022 Christmas Game!

Originally made for our school XmasJam!
Made in 3 days with 6 people total.

The theme was "Keep Sticking" (Blijven Plakken), so we made a fast past 2d platformer, inspired by games like Geometry Dash or Super Meat Boy!

You are a small snowman who can jump, double jump, and dash through the air, but if you touch the sealing, you will stick to it! 

A total of 3 levels are played in random order. So when you reach the end of one level, you go seamlessly to another level.

How many meters can you travel before crashing into an object?

Tip: To end a level, you need to enter THE BOTTOM of a chimney.

Note: The "Jump Dash" doesn't actually make you jump.
